# opslevel_team (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "opslevel_team" "devs" {
    alias = "developers"
}

data "opslevel_team" "devs" {
    id = "Z2lkOi8vb3BzbGV2ZWwvU2VydmljZS83NzQ0"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- **alias** (String) An alias of the team to find by.
- **id** (String) The id of the team to find.

### Read-Only

- **name** (String)
